snippet: Jules Pieri is chief executive and co-founder of Daily Grommet, an online consumer marketplace, based in Lexington, Mass. She is not one of those business travelers for whom everything goes right.
abstract: Frequent Flier column features Daily Grommet chief executive and co-founder Jules Pieri discussing her flying experiences.
lead_paragraph: Jules Pieri is chief executive and co-founder of Daily Grommet, an online consumer marketplace, based in Lexington, Mass. She is not one of those business travelers for whom everything goes right.

headline.seo: A Traveler’s Unexpected Memento While Walking Through O’Hare - Frequent Flier
headline.main: An Unexpected Memento While Walking at O’Hare, And Other Misadventures
headline.print_headline: An Unexpected Memento While Walking at O’Hare, And Other Misadventures
